TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewCancelEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 "取消" 按钮时，但在退出插入或编辑模式之前，控件引发事件。The control raises the event when the Cancel button is clicked, but before exiting insert or edit mode. ("取消" 按钮是一个按钮，它的 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "取消" ) 这使您能够提供一个事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，例如，如果它会使项处于不需要的状态，则停止取消操作。(A Cancel button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Cancel") This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the item in an unwanted state. 对象传递到事件处理方法。A object is passed to the event-handling method. 此对象可用于确定包含引发事件的 "取消" 按钮的项的索引。This object enables you to determine the index of the item that contains the Cancel button that raised the event. 你还可以确定取消了哪些操作。You can also determine what operation was canceled. 若要停止取消操作，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To stop the cancel operation, set the property to `true`. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象在 用户取消控件中的插入或更新操作时显示一条消息 。The following example shows how to use the object to display a message when the user cancels the insert or update operation in a control. 对象传递给事件的事件处理方法 。The object is passed to the event-handling method for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/CS/ListViewItemCancelingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/VB/ListViewItemCancelingVB.aspx#1)]

related.span: 技术概述： ListView 控件

param.name: itemIndex
param.span: 项的索引，该项包含引发事件的“取消”按钮。

span.span: The index of the item that contains the Cancel button that raised the event.

param.name: cancelMode
param.span: 值之一，表示用户取消了何种操作。

span.span: One of the values that indicates which operation the user canceled.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示 类的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of class. |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`cancelMode` 参数的值。The value of the `cancelMode` parameter.| ||`itemIndex` 参数的值。The value of the `itemIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CancelMode As ListViewCancelMode

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取单击“取消”按钮时 控件所处的数据输入模式。

span.span: Gets the data-entry mode that the control was in when the Cancel button was clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 "取消" 按钮时，可以使用属性来确定控件是处于编辑模式还是处于插入模式。Use the property to determine whether the control was in edit or insert mode when the Cancel button was clicked. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定 当用户单击 "取消" 按钮时控件所在的数据输入模式。The following example shows how to use the property to determine the data-entry mode that the control was in when the user clicked the Cancel button. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/CS/ListViewItemCancelingCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/VB/ListViewItemCancelingVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ItemIndex As Integer
public: property int ItemIndex { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取项的索引，该项包含引发事件的“取消”按钮。

span.span: Gets the index of the item that contains the Cancel button that raised the event.

value.span: 包含引发事件的“取消”按钮的项从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item that contains the Cancel button that raised the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定包含用户单击的 "取消" 按钮的项的索引。Use the property to determine the index of the item that contains the Cancel button clicked by the user. 项索引通常用于从控件集合中检索项，这样 您就可以访问项的属性。The item index is often used to retrieve the item from the collection of the control, which enables you to access the item's properties. 当 属性设置为时 `ListViewCancelMode.CancelingInsert` ，属性的值 始终为-1。When the property is set to `ListViewCancelMode.CancelingInsert`, the value of the property is always -1. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定包含用户单击的 "取消" 按钮的编辑项的索引。The following example shows how to use the property to determine the index of the edit item that contains the Cancel button that was clicked by the user. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/CS/ListViewItemCancelingCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/VB/ListViewItemCancelingVB.aspx#2)]
